name: A jagged opal rapier known as 'Plaguedealer' (1h)
data: It has magnificent weapon class for its type (low in general).
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It does poison damage like a god.
When piercing enemys flesh, this rapier has a chance make the enemy more vulnerable to poison.
